014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal;
015
016import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle;
017import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
018import java.lang.reflect.Method;
019import java.lang.reflect.Modifier;
020import java.lang.reflect.Type;
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.Arrays;
023import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Set;
026
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.UtilityClassException;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ColumnName;
030
031public class PojoBuilderUtils {
032    private static final String[] GETTER_PREFIXES = {"get", "is"};
033    private PojoBuilderUtils() {
034        throw new UtilityClassException();
035    }
036
037    public static boolean isProperty(Method m) {
038        return m.getParameterCount() == 0
039            && !m.isSynthetic()
040            && !Modifier.isStatic(m.getModifiers())
041            && m.getDeclaringClass() != Object.class;
042    }
043
044    public static String propertyName(Method m) {
045        ColumnName colName = m.getAnnotation(ColumnName.class);
046        if (colName != null) {
047            return colName.value();
048        }
049        return defaultSetterName(m.getName());
050    }
051
052    public static String defaultSetterName(String name) {
053        for (String prefix : GETTER_PREFIXES) {
054            if (name.startsWith(prefix)
055                && name.length() > prefix.length()
056                && Character.isUpperCase(name.charAt(prefix.length()))) {
057                return chopPrefix(name, prefix.length());
058            }
059        }
060        return name;
061    }
062
063    public static String chopPrefix(final String name, int off) {
064        return name.substring(off, off + 1).toLowerCase() + name.substring(off + 1);
065    }
066
067    private static Set<String> setterNames(String name) {
068        final Set<String> names = new LinkedHashSet<>();
069        final String rest = name.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + name.substring(1);
070
071        names.add("set" + rest);
072        names.add("is" + rest);
073
074        return names;
075    }
076
077    public static MethodHandle findBuilderSetter(final Class<?> builderClass, String name, Method decl, Type type)
078        throws IllegalAccessException {
079        final List<NoSuchMethodException> failures = new ArrayList<>();
080        final Set<String> names = new LinkedHashSet<>();
081        names.add(PojoBuilderUtils.defaultSetterName(decl.getName()));
082        names.add(name);
083        if (name.length() > 1) {
084            names.addAll(setterNames(name));
085        }
086        ColumnName columnName = decl.getAnnotation(ColumnName.class);
087        if (columnName != null && columnName.value().equals(name)) {
088            names.addAll(setterNames(PojoBuilderUtils.defaultSetterName(decl.getName())));
089        }
090        for (String tryName : names) {
091            try {
092                return MethodHandles.lookup().unreflect(builderClass.getMethod(tryName, GenericTypes.getErasedType(type)));
093            } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
094                failures.add(e);
095            }
096        }
097        for (Method m : builderClass.getMethods()) {
098            if (names.contains(m.getName()) && m.getParameterCount() == 1) {
099                return MethodHandles.lookup().unreflect(m);
100            }
101        }
102        final IllegalArgumentException iae = new IllegalArgumentException("Failed to find builder setter for property " + name + " on " + builderClass);
103        failures.forEach(iae::addSuppressed);
104        return MethodHandles.dropArguments(
105            MethodHandles.throwException(Object.class, IllegalArgumentException.class),
106            1, Arrays.asList(Object.class, Object.class))
107            .bindTo(iae);
108    }
109
110    public static MethodHandle alwaysSet() {
111        return MethodHandles.dropArguments(MethodHandles.constant(boolean.class, true), 0, Object.class);
112    }
113}
